channel.title: Some ideas for new releases
channel.description: Hello. I thought it would be pretty clever that when you are done with xen, you should make it a separate release and call it Xen Source. Also, how about Black Mesa: Blue Shift & Black Mesa: Opposing Force? (after you're done with the original, that is)

item.title: Some ideas for new releases
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
^ What he said. Next time please read the FAQ before posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Some ideas for new releases
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
There is already a team remaking Opposing Force, and two teams remaking Blue Shift. Also, most of the developers have already stated that they will be moving on.

Read full topic
